member.summary: Color enum representing color based on cheer amount.

member.name: F:TwitchLib.Api.Core.Enums.BadgeColor.Purple
member.summary: Purple = 100 -> 999

member.name: F:TwitchLib.Api.Core.Enums.BadgeColor.Gray
member.summary: Gray = 1 -> 99

summary.para: Enum representing the Content Classification Labels.

Content Classification Label for broadcasts with excessive tobacco glorification or promotion, any marijuana consumption/use, legal drug and alcohol induced intoxication, discussions of illegal drugs.
Content Classification Label for broadcasts with content that focuses on sexualized physical attributes and activities, sexual topics, or experiences.
Content Classification Label for broadcasts with simulations and/or depictions of realistic violence, gore, extreme injury, or death.
Content Classification Label for broadcasts that participate in online or in-person gambling, poker or fantasy sports, that involve the exchange of real money.
Content Classification Label for broadcasts with prolonged, and repeated use of obscenities, profanities, and vulgarities, especially as a regular part of speech.
